Scene.name: Výjezd z domova
Scene.heading: EXT. LOUKA - DEN
Scene.rtf:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1250\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1029{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset238 Courier New;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Courier New;}} {\colortbl ;\red255\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;} {\*\generator Riched20 10.0.19041}\viewkind4\uc1 \pard\li75\ri75\f0\fs24 Fakt nev\f1\lang1033\'ed\f0\lang1029 m. Prost\'ec n\'eckde.\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\cf1 KAREL\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500 U\'9e zase!\cf0\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\par \cf2 PAVEL\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500 Tak nev\f1\lang1033\'ed\f0\lang1029 m.\cf0\par
\pard\li1500\ri1500\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\cf1\f1\lang1033 KAREL\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500 Nev\'ed\f0\lang1029 m, co od toho m\f1\lang1033\'e1\f0\lang1029 m \'e8ekat.\par \par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\cf2\f1\lang1033 PAVEL\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500 Modr\'e1\f0\lang1029 !\cf0\par \par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\cf1 KAREL\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500\'c8erven\f1\lang1033\'e1\f0\lang1029 !\cf0\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\par }

Scene.name: Závěr
Scene.heading: EXT. NA LOUCE - DEN

Scene.name: Setkání v lese
Scene.heading: EXP. LES - DEN
Scene.rtf:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1250\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1029{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset238 Courier New;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Courier New;}} {\colortbl ;\red255\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green0\blue139;\red139\green0\blue0;} {\*\generator Riched20 10.0.19041}\viewkind4\uc1 \pard\li75\ri75\f0\fs24 Karel vyj\f1\lang1033\'ed\f0\'9ed\f1\'ed z domu. Je lehce oble\f0\'e8en\f1\'fd a t\f0\'f8ese se zimou. Opod\f1\'e1l stoj\'ed Josef a d\'edv\'e1 se na oblohu.\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\cf1\par KAREL\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500 (zoufale)\par Co te\f0\'ef budu d\'eclat ?\cf0\par
\pard\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\cf2 JOSEF\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500 To je mi naprosto fuk. J\f1\'e1 m\'e1m dnes dost\cf3 sv\'e9 pr\'e1ce.\cf0\par
\pard\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\cf2 PAVEL\cf4\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500\f0\lang1029 M\'f9\'9eu \f1\lang1033 aspo\f0\lang1029\'f2\f1\lang1033 trochu pomoct\cf0\f0\lang1029 ?\par
\pard\li1500\ri1500\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\cf2\f1\lang1033 KAREL\par
\pard\li2325\ri1500 (zoufale)\cf4\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500 Co te\f0\'ef budu d\'eclat ?\cf0\par
\pard\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\cf2 JOSEF\cf3\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500 To je mi naprosto fuk. J\f1\'e1 m\'e1m dnes dost sv\'e9 pr\'e1ce.\cf0\par
\pard\li3075\ri1500\par \cf4 PAVEL\par
\pard\li1575\ri1500\f0\lang1029 M\'f9\'9eu \f1\lang1033 aspo\f0\lang1029\'f2\f1\lang1033 trochu pomoct\cf0\f0\lang1029 ?\par
\pard\li1500\ri1500\par }
